product_name: Royal Robbins Trail Traveler Pants - Men's 32" Inseam - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Travel in comfort even in warm climates with Trail Traveler Pants. They offer sun protection, wrinkle-resistance, quick dry time, a full-length gusset and secure pockets.
short_description: Travel in comfort even in warm climates with Trail Traveler Pants. They offer sun protection, wrinkle-resistance, quick dry time, a full-length gusset and secure pockets.
